mapper.select:
SELECT
tpl.`code`
tplb.brand_name
tpl.prod_category1st_name,tpl.prod_category_name, tpl.prod_category2nd_name, tpl.prod_category3rd_name
tpl.silhouette_name
tpl.template_name
tpli.name as parts_name
tpl.`status`
tpl.enable_flag
FROM t_pattern_library tpl
JOIN t_pattern_library_item tpli ON tpli.pattern_library_id = tpl.id AND tpli.del_flag = '0' and tpli.type = 4
JOIN t_pattern_library_brand tplb ON tplb.pattern_library_id = tpl.id
WHERE tpl.del_flag = '0'
and (tplb.brand_name is not null and tplb.brand_name != '')
and (tpl.prod_category1st_name is not null and tpl.prod_category1st_name != '')
and (tpl.silhouette_name is not null and tpl.silhouette_name != '')
and (tpl.template_name is not null and tpl.template_name != '')
and (tpli.name is not null and tpli.name != '')
and tpl.`status` is not null
and tpl.enable_flag is not null
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
group by tplb.brand_name
group by tpl.prod_category1st_name, tpl.prod_category_name, tpl.prod_category2nd_name,tpl.prod_category3rd_name
group by tpl.silhouette_name
group by tpl.template_name
group by tpli.name
group by tpl.`status`
group by tpl.enable_flag
ORDER BY tpl.serial_number DESC
